summary: Diff shows `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` was modified with a substantial V45-style UI (lucide-react imports, local seed data, gradient/glassmorphism card styling). However, because the file content is truncated and the user-provided V45 code block is not included here, the diff summary is insufficient to verify the “exact full-file replacement” requirement or the specific V45 visual/UX acceptance criteria. Two additional files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt`, `project_state.json`) were modified without being requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fully overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact user-provided V45 “NEXUS ELITE POLISH” code block (full file replacement), preserving components, `INITIAL_SALONS`, `PRESETS`, Tailwind classes, imports, UI strings, and interaction logic exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` is truncated in the diff summary, and the referenced user-provided V45 code block is not present in the provided materials, so an exact/verbatim full-file match cannot be verified from the diff summary alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V45 overwrite with only minimal mechanical fixes required by the repo, without changing intended V45 UI/layout/copy/behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not provide evidence of build success (`npm run build`) or absence of runtime errors, and the AppV1 implementation is truncated so potential build-breaking issues (e.g., missing components/exports/references later in file) cannot be assessed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Preserve and verify V45 visual changes: (1) Salon/Domicile selector as a 2-column grid with no overflow on mobile, (2) premium gradient/glass textures on cards/surfaces, (3) revamped Pro landing with large background image and larger marketing typography/airier layout.
missing_requirements.reason: While the truncated snippet shows some gradient/glass styling on a card, the diff summary does not include the Salon/Domicile selector implementation or the Pro landing view, so the specific visual acceptance criteria cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and apply minimal mechanical build fixes; it did not request modifying repository summary documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` metadata/state version and summary content.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to project state tracking/metadata; only the AppV1 overwrite and minimal build fixes were requested.
